name: Sergio Matos Agency
tag_list: private-label, brands, representation, production, fashion, shoes, bags, apparel, clothes, mode, accessories, export, import
overview:
Sérgio Matos Agency has an extensive network of manufacturers which are operating across Portugal. We give to our customers a quality development and production resource.

Brand owners, can depend on Sérgio Matos Agency to provide quality and reliability. With our flexible approach, they can choose the precise level of support they need. This can mean solely manufacturing or the entire process from concept and packaging to delivery. Our development teams are available to support customers from their original ideas.

Typically, brand owners know about the quality of Portuguese production and turn to us when:

They need our production, formulation, design and technical expertise They have a short to medium term capacity issue They need a second manufacturer They want increase the range of products They are a pure marketing organisation with no manufacturing capability themselves Looking for long term partnerships Looking for distribution in Portuguese Market Looking for distribution in European Market (Non-EU Brands) They want someone checking all production steps They want increase their brand quality and image Looking for strategies and marketing projects Looking for reduce expenditures in human resources and control checking Looking for expert people with knowledge of all production in Portugal Customers particularly appreciate our:

Personal Values Innovation Leathership Quality Control, safety and environmental standards Quality Research Speed to answer Global Reach Best practices Discretion and confidentiality
